org.cougaar.core.persist
Class PersistenceOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      java.io.ObjectOutputStream
          org.cougaar.core.persist.PersistenceOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.io.ObjectOutput, java.io.ObjectStreamConstants, PersistenceStream
public class PersistenceOutputStream
extends java.io.ObjectOutputStream
implements PersistenceStream

Write persistable objects to a stream.

See Also:
PersistenceInputStream

writeAssociation

public PersistenceReference[] writeAssociation(PersistenceAssociation pAssoc)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Write a plan object from a PersistenceAssociation.

Parameters:
pAssoc - the PersistenceAssocation having the object to save.
Returns:
an array of the PersistenceReferences of the objects that were actually saved. This typically includes the objects that are referenced by the object being saved (and the objects they reference, etc.).
Throws:
java.io.IOException

replaceObject

protected java.lang.Object replaceObject(java.lang.Object o)
Replace objects that are in the identityTable with reference objects. This operation is suppressed for objects that have changed and actually need to be written.

Overrides:
replaceObject in class java.io.ObjectOutputStream
Parameters:
o - the object to consider for replacement.
Returns:
the replacement object.

getIdentityTable

public org.cougaar.core.persist.IdentityTable getIdentityTable()
Get the IdentityTable being used by this stream. This is not normally used since the IdentityTable is usually maintained by the creator of this stream.

Returns:
the IdentityTable being used by this stream.

setIdentityTable

public void setIdentityTable(org.cougaar.core.persist.IdentityTable identityTable)
Set the IdentityTable to be used by this stream. The IdentityTable contains assocations of objects to earlier persistence deltas. References to these earlier objects are replaced with reference objects to save space.

Parameters:
identityTable - the new IdentityTable to use.
